figure_1: Overview of molecular mechanisms of cisplatin in cancer treatment. The figure was drawn in adobe illustrator.
figure_2: Cisplatin resistance mechanism. (1) Reduced intracellular accumulation of cisplatin. (2) Increased sequestration of cisplatin by GSH and other cytoplasmic scavengers with nucleophilic properties. (3) Enhanced DNA damage repair ability. (4) Defects in apoptotic signal transduction pathways. The figure was drawn in Adobe Illustrator.
